name: syllaby-postman-collection
description: Postman collection and environments for Syllaby API

scripts.test:all: npm run test:local && npm run test:dev && npm run test:staging
scripts.validate: node -e "['syllaby-api-collection.json', 'syllaby-local-environment.json', 'syllaby-development-environment.json', 'syllaby-staging-environment.json', 'syllaby-production-environment.json'].forEach(f => { try { JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync(f, 'utf8')); console.log('✓', f); } catch(e) { console.error('✗', f, e.message); process.exit(1); } })"
scripts.report: newman run syllaby-api-collection.json -e syllaby-local-environment.json -r htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export newman-report.html

author: Syllaby Team
